content: two 1 75 oz skeins of patons grace completes a pair of socks the pattern is simple increases are made in the increases of the previous round so there s less counting fit is more important than stitch or row count as in sewing where the fabric is forgiving and can be stretched or gathered as necessary i wanted this pattern to be simple and relaxing without the rigid counting and marking which has frustrated my sock designs more times than i can count
